entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet run file.cs` `#:` directive for project references #48746
  • dotnet build --help does not show Property option `--property` #48742

Closed

  • Test failure in BlazorWebAssembly StaticWebAssets_BuildMinimal_Works - Expected group '.gz' to have '424' endpoints but found '423' - `dotnet.js.gz` is missing. #48750
  • Create cgmanifest.json file #46725
  • Revise `TryGetProjectOrSolutionFilePath` and `GetSolutionFilePaths` logic for the new dotnet test experience #47635
    10.0.1xx
  • Containers targets need to keep 'execution time' data ordering consistent for single-RID publishes #48579

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude tests from binskim scanning #48756
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement auto-restarting on rude edit or no-effect change #48752
  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
  • Use LangVersion=Preview #48747
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Re-add the tar no-sign patch #48758
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pass through OfficialBuilder #48757
  • Use OfficialBuildId from SB release manifest #48720
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #48745
  • Downgrade implicit version to unblock workloads testing from main #48704
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [dotnet test for MTP]: Copy implementation for determining project/solution to build from MSBuild #48748
  • Add / in between skipped tests and retrie tests #48540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • ensure that single-rid container publishes populate all container information #48584
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.4.25228.1 #48743
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48741
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Remove dead VMR files #48744
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • macOS Installer: Update relese notes link #48722
    Servicing-consider, Branch Lockdown
  • [WIP] `dotnet tool exec <package[@version]>` one-shot execution #48443
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [10.0.1xx-preview4] Consolidate UB and SB pipelines #48703
  • Support RID-specific .NET Tool packages #48575
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • sln-add: Refactor logic for autogenerating solution folders #48726
    Area-CLI
  • Local dev props #48739
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support build/restore of file-based programs #48662
    Area-run-file
  • Update multi-file 'dotnet run file' documentation #48437
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • realpath in c# #45637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Don't add solution folders outside the scope of solution directory #48611
    Servicing-consider, Area-CLI
